Demo.loginTitle1: Welcome to the demo version home application
Demo.loginTitle2: Selecting the login target cell is completed
Demo.loginTitle3: Thank you for your hard work.
Demo.loginTutorial1:
I will explain how to use the home application in the demo version.
Let's first enter the cell URL to log in.
This time the demo cell URL:
https://demo.personium.io/democell/
I will try logging in to.
Demo.loginTutorial2:
You can now access the cell you are logging in to.
Let's login to the cell.
Login ID to this cell and PASS
ID: me
PW: democell
Demo.loginTutorial3: This concludes the description of the demo home application.
Demo.mainTutorial1:
Login succeeded.
Next, we will explain the function of home application.
Please select the menu icon in the upper right.
Demo.mainTutorial4:
The side menu has the following functions.
- Edit profile
You can change display name and description of your cell, profile picture.
- Change Password
You can change the password of the currently logged in account.
- Account
You can create and edit accounts that can log in to your cell.
- Role
You can create, edit, and delete roles.
- Relation
You can create, edit, and delete relationships.
- Log Out
Log out from the logged in cell.
Demo.mainTutorial5:
Let's install the application this time.
Please select the black part on the left side of the screen and close the side menu.
Demo.mainTutorial6: Please select "App Market" icon in MENU.
Demo.mainTutorial7:
MyBoard was been installed in the cell.
Let's select the MyBoard icon and start the application.
Demo.mainTutorial8:
Let's log out at the end.
From the menu icon in the upper right, select Logout.
Demo.applicationTutorial:
Installed applications are displayed in "installed",
Applications not installed are displayed in "Application list".
Now I have not installed anything, so let's install MyBoard.
